snippet: Skylar Laine, the ebullient young country singer from Mississippi, was voted off "American Idol," but Joshua Ledet has shown he has extremely rare gifts when it comes to R&B music.
abstract: Skylar Laine, the ebullient young country singer from Mississippi, was voted off "American Idol," but Joshua Ledet has shown he has extremely rare gifts when it comes to R&B music.

headline.main: No More Country on 'Idol,' but a Soul Powerhouse Emerges
